eg.document

Class FileDocument

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.document.FileDocument

  • public final class FileDocument
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the document that is either initialized with a language and which a file may be assigned to afterwards or is initialized with a file which defines the language

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileDocument(EditArea editArea, java.io.File f)
      Creates a FileDocument with the specified file whose content is displayed.
      FileDocument(EditArea editArea, Languages lang)
      Creates a FileDocument with the specified language and which a file can be assigned to afterwards

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileDocument

        public FileDocument(EditArea editArea,
                    java.io.File f)
        Creates a FileDocument with the specified file whose content is displayed.
        The file extension defines the language. The language cannot be changed afterwards but a new file may be set which also may define another language
        Parameters:
        editArea - a new EditArea
        f - the file

      • FileDocument

        public FileDocument(EditArea editArea,
                    Languages lang)
        Creates a FileDocument with the specified language and which a file can be assigned to afterwards
        Parameters:
        editArea - a new EditArea
        lang - the language that is one of the constants in Languages
